answers.answer: Congrats on getting your button and I wish you all the best during labor. Pretty soon you and your baby will be home beginning a new chapter in your life:)
Congrads!your sooo lucky. Im 32weeks 2days im not due till september 22. And im patiently waiting...I can't wait to read your birth story: )
Congratulations and good luck! You'll do great :-)

question: I am exactly 36 weeks today and finally got my Arrived? button, yay me! I also found out my induction date which will be exactly one week from today on Aug. 6 at midnight due to preeclampsia (I've been at the hospital on bed rest for about a week and a half) which is also my sisters birthday! So I get to push my button really soon. So excited, everything seems to be happening so fast all of a sudden. Can't wait to meet my princess! :)
title: Induction and Arrived Button!
